reviewText: Ok lets get this out of the way. These are Full Moon Pictures which mean yes you will see breasts. You will also see decent gore and lots of blood. The Dead Hate The Living is about a group of filmmakers who let loose a whole unique twisted group of zombies who want to make every living person dead. Decent movie. Up next is Prison of the Dead which is about a group of rich kids who go to a friends funeral only to fight for their lives against witch hunting zombies. Yeah its weird but fun. Last is The Dead Want Woman. A silent era movie star takes her life and now any poor bimbo who goe into her house is a potential zombie sex toy. That sums up that soft core porn movie. But at least the zombie makeup looks good. If your a zombie fan buy for the first two.
